snippet.title: UmiharaKawase Shun Steam Edition   trailer
snippet.description:
Play as `Umihara Kawase` - a backpacking Japanese sushi chef armed with a fishing rod, a rubber fishing line and a fishing hook. Avoid fish-like enemies, conveyer belts, spikes, watery pits, time travel and more.

View on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/384700/
------------------------------------------------

Want to consistently know what's coming out in the world of PC Gaming? Want to receive all the Beta Signup opportunities every week? Then watch 

our Live Show every Tuesday night at 9:30PM US Eastern, on http://www.twitch.tv/opnoobsonline

And if that wasn't enough, we give a game away every week to the most lively folk in chat! 

Thanks for tuning in, and check us out at www.opnoobs.com
